About Us- Our Mission -

To provide the most actionable app food delivery.

About

With AUP Cafeteria Online delivery, our goal is to make ordering at the cafeteria easier and more comfortable. Everyone is guessing. How can we solve the problem? the best solution is switching over to online ordering where users can spend less of their time waiting on queues and more efficient at the confines of their dormitories, classrooms, and anywhere inside the campus.

Our mission at Aup Cafeteria Online Delivery is to make the app more transparent and reliable to customers, especially students with strict daily schedules. Today we want to provide the most actionable app. We want to make this app available as soon as possible.

    • My name is Jared Ibañez, a second-year student at the Adventist University of the Philippines studying Information Technology. Born at Cabanatuan —and raised in Puting Kahoy, Silang, Cavite, I’ve basically lived my life exploring and widening my horizons in this small town of Cavite. I’ve engaged in many activities of this school: small group, choir, —-, you name it! However, when I was invited to play with the computer, I was hooked. It made me connect with millions of people across the globe enhancing our skills in terms of intellect and memory via video games.
